name: Green Bastards!
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Green Bastards! is a quick prototype created by myself in 3 weeks for a programming assignment in my game design program back in 2019. 

- Manage your health and ammo while traversing dangerous alien caves in search of treasure!

- Swing like Tarzan on hoops inexplicably floating in the air! 

- Beat the game with the least amount of time and bullets fired to get the highest score. 

NOTE: This game represents some of my earlier work and is unfinished and lacking polish! 

CREDITS:

Background art and UI was a free asset download from a creator on itch.io but I have since lost the reference to the creator and can not find them! If you know who created the tileset, please let me know in the comments so I can give the credit where it is due!
